sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 

'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,

'@{item().SrcSystem}' as SrcSystem,
'-' as Source,
'SourceSystemEntityDuplicates' as Destination,
'Staging to Transformed' as CopyActivity,

'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,

'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
0 as RowsSkipped,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.usedParallelCopies}' as ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as EffectiveIntegrationRuntime,

'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_StartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_EndTime,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_QueuingDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_TimeToFirstByte_SS,
'@{activity('Staging to Transformed').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_TransferDuration_SS,
1 as CopyActivity_Stage,
0 as SequenceGroup

SELECT 

'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,

'@{item().SrcSystem}' as SrcSystem,
'-' as Source,
'SourceSystemEntityDuplicates' as Destination,
'Transformed to Destination' as CopyActivity,

'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,

'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
0 as RowsSkipped,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.usedParallelCopies}' as ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as EffectiveIntegrationRuntime,

'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_StartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_EndTime,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_QueuingDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_TimeToFirstByte_SS,
'@{activity('Transformed to Control').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_TransferDuration_SS,
2 as CopyActivity_Stage,
0 as SequenceGroup

activities.name: PurgePipelineAuditLog
activities.description:
Deletes data older than 30Days old

- PipelineAuditLog
-PipelineAuditDetailLog

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select	 pp.Pipeline
		,pp.SrcSystem
		,pp.EntityType
		,pp.SrcServer
		,pp.SrcDatabase
		,pp.DestSchema
		,pp.DestEntity
		,pp.Entity
		,pp.UpsertKeyColumn
		,cast(replace(cast(pp.FetchXML as nvarchar(max)),'operator="last-x-hours" value="1"','operator="not-null"') as xml) as FetchXML
		,pp.IsActive
from	dbo.PipelineParameters pp
where	isActive = 1
and		pp.EntityType in ('Reference', 'Core_A','Core_B','Core_C', 'Transactional')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 

'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,

'@{item().SrcSystem}' as SrcSystem,
'@{item().Entity}' as Source,
'@{item().DestEntity}' as Destination,
'Destination to Config' as CopyActivity,

'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,

'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.rowsSkipped}' as RowsSkipped,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.usedParallelCopies}' as ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as EffectiveIntegrationRuntime,

'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_StartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_EndTime,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_QueuingDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_TimeToFirstByte_SS,
'@{activity('Destination to Config').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_TransferDuration_SS,
3 as CopyActivity_Stage,
0 as SequenceGroup
